analysis.description:
CryptoColors._payout (/unique_chucks/9/0x94cac9b8a8e597e5a934b91c0e5a06fe863bde13.sol#461-465) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ceoAddress.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/9/0x94cac9b8a8e597e5a934b91c0e5a06fe863bde13.sol#463)
	- _to.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/9/0x94cac9b8a8e597e5a934b91c0e5a06fe863bde13.sol#464-465)

CryptoColors (/unique_chucks/9/0x94cac9b8a8e597e5a934b91c0e5a06fe863bde13.sol#46-473) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):

	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/9/0x94cac9b8a8e597e5a934b91c0e5a06fe863bde13.sol#413-420)
